Summary: Noticed object in the sky while visiting with friend
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son witnessed the object sighting, I'm making the report on his behalf. He told me that he was visiting with a friend and noticed a strange light in the night sky. He said he thought it was a very bright star at first but the object got larger and was moving.. He took a picture of the object with his cell phone and looked down at the picture to see how it came out when he looked back up the object had vanished.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Eugene
There were no other sightings in Eugene on or around November 11th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
